title: Incinerator
alt: My trash can broke recently and I had to get rid of it. When I picked it up, I suffered a brief but harrowing existential crisis.
transcript:
[Cueball and Ponytail stand next to an incinerator, with a combustion chamber and flue that rises up to the top of the frame.]
Ponytail: Great, the new incinerator is installed. Now we just need to dispose of the old one.[Ponytail walks out of the frame.][Cueball lowers his head, beat panel][Cueball raises his hand and begins to ask a question.]
Cueball: Hey, couldâ€”
Ponytail (off-panel): No.
Cueball: Aww, maaan.
